page.title: 11FIVE-A-SIDE COMPETITION.
page.content: Last year our school took part in a five-a-side competition .The four teams were Coxhoe Kelloe Cassop and Bowburn.It was a knock-out competition.We played Cassop first.Our team was{Stephen Bell,Stuart Haigh, Dale Sudder,Michael Purvis and Stephen Smith and the reserves were {Ian Shepherd, Neil Kane and Kevin Platts the half-time score was 4-0 to Bowburn and{Stephen Bell saved a penalty the full-time score was 6-2 to Bowburn and we were in the final against Coxhoe and we beat them 2-0 and we won the{Stan Appleby Shield this years competition is on the 15th June and we are the holders.The school which won in 1983 was Cassop.This year we hope to win the shield for the second time running.
